Discover a seamless way to export Reddit comments with the Reddit Comment Exporter extension, specifically designed for users of the classic Reddit interface. This powerful tool enhances your browsing experience by enabling you to save comments from any Reddit thread in both JSON and CSV formats, providing flexibility for data analysis, archiving, or sharing.

Key Features:

1. Easy Export: Quickly export Reddit comments from any thread with just a few clicks. Whether you're conducting research, archiving discussions, or simply want to save comments for later reading, our extension makes it effortless.

2. Support for Classic Reddit: Tailored to users of the old Reddit layout, this extension ensures compatibility and smooth operation, allowing you to navigate and export comments without any hassle.

3. Flexible Formats: Choose between JSON and CSV formats for your exported comments. JSON format is ideal for those who need structured data for programming or data analysis purposes, while CSV format is perfect for spreadsheet applications and more straightforward data review.

4. User-Friendly Interface: With a simple and intuitive interface, exporting comments is straightforward. No complicated settings or configurations are requiredâ€”just install the extension and start exporting with ease.

5. Privacy-Focused: We value your privacy. The Reddit Comment Exporter operates entirely on your browser without the need for external servers, ensuring that your data remains private and secure.

Installation and Use:
1. Add the Reddit Comment Exporter to Chrome from the Chrome Web Store.
2. Navigate to any Reddit thread on the old Reddit layout.
3. Click the extension icon in your browser's toolbar to open the export options.
4. Select your preferred format (JSON or CSV) and start the export process.
5. Once the export is complete, the file will automatically download to your computer.

Enhance your Reddit experience by keeping a record of insightful comments, funny exchanges, or important discussions. With the Reddit Comment Exporter, saving and analyzing Reddit comments has never been easier or more convenient. Install today and unlock the full potential of Reddit comments at your fingertips.
